DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Proboscis lengths for hawkmoth species
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: A two-column data frame containing species names and the proboscis length corresponding to each species. These data are drawn from https://doi.org/10.5061/dryad.qn83r and the original publication should be cited when referring to this data. In cases where a species occurred in more than one network in the aforementioned paper, the mean proboscis length is given in this file.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: Ornstein-Uhlenbeck
mutualism
macroevolution
pollination
